attributes.action: provide a better community for people who are disabled & got disabilities & to put in place that people who are disabled & with disabilities get free of charge into places (e.g. Attractions, places we visit, etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who things the community sometimes cannot be right for some who have disabilities?

Who thinks it would be better for those to have a community a bit better and to show a bit more respect?

Who thinks it would be better that those with disabilities and those disabled got free of charge when visiting places? This also could help them to budget money for those who get weekly allowance.
